label: 感状
説明文: In order to review the merit of battle service claims, the kanrei (管領) became the shōgun's agent in receiving and processing chūshin-jō (claims of merit in battle), presenting those claims to the shōgun, and issuing certificates of commendation (kanjō).#[article]Yoshida Kenji. The Official Edicts of the Kanrei during the Reign of Shōgun Ashikaga Yoshinori (r. 1429-1442)
